Validate the sellableStatus status for an offer
custom_steps:
When the TVID is actively listed- "sellableStatus": "LISTED"

When the TVID is sold listed-"sellableStatus": "SOLD"

When the TVID is reversed listed-"sellableStatus": "REVERSED"

When the TVID is cancelled listed-"sellableStatus": "NOT_LISTED"
When listed multiple marketplace sellableStatus": "LISTED_IN_ANOTHER_MARKETPLACE"
custom_expected:
"sellableStatus": "LISTED"
"sellableStatus": "SOLD"
"sellableStatus": "REVERSED"
"sellableStatus": "NOT_LISTED"

Record all the ticket IDs part of same TVID
custom_preconds: * PV data being altered to to reoffer***
custom_steps:
Create an offer with a TVID-> offer should the created

Search the TVID in ticket Table->table should show a single row for the TVID

Cancel offer->Offer should be cancelled 

Search the TVID in ticket Table->table should show a single row for the TVID

** PV data being altered to to reoffer***

Create an offer with a  the same TVID-> a new offer should the created

Search the TVID in ticket Table->table should show a two rows for the TVID ( different ticket IDs)
custom_expected: Search the TVID in ticket Table->table should show a two rows for the TVID ( different ticket IDs)

title: Verify Seatgeek Exclusive cancellation when seatGeek offer gets cancelled first
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a ticket is listed for sale on StubHub and Vivid Seats.
AND that same ticket is subsequently listed on SeatGeek.
custom_steps:
WHEN a fan cancels the listing on SeatGeek
AND at least one of the StubHub and Vivid Seats listings is still open
custom_expected: THEN the ticket may be listed on an additional ATM (even if that ATM is SeatGeek again)

title: SCENARIO: SeatGeek Lists first & has exclusivity

custom_steps: WHEN a seller lists that same ticket on Stubhub
custom_expected: THEN do not create the listing for Stubhub
